thread.title: The Happiest Countries in the World Smart Living
thread.title_full: The Happiest Countries in the World | POPSUGAR Smart Living

author: Ashley Paige
title: The Happiest Countries in the World Smart Living
text:
Have you ever stopped to think about how happy you really are and how your environment may influence your well-being? The World Happiness Report contains the latest findings on the happiest countries in the world for 2017 , and you may be a little surprised to see the United States didn't make the top 10. (Or, you know, maybe you're not shocked at all, given the current troubling state of American politics .)
Many of the highest-rated nations are European, and the bottom tier consists of places such as Madagascar, Tanzania, Liberia, Afghanistan, and Burundi, to name a few. Check out the full 155-nation list here â€” it's fascinating, to say the least. Although Denmark topped 2016's list, the top 10 for this year are the same as last year, just reordered a bit!
